imdb.plot outline: "It's Christmastime and Lena Paul's boyfriend is bringing her home for the holidays to meet his family - his mother (Alexis Fawx) and sister (Jillian Janson), as well as his new stepdad (Charles Dera) and stepbrother (Tyler Nixon). It doesn't take long for Lena to discover that things are not what they seem, and that this seemingly idyllic suburban household is actually a yuletide bordello of filthy perversion. Enjoy Christmas as you've never experienced it before, Brazzers style!."
imdb.title: A Brazzers Christmas Special
plot: "It's Christmastime and Lena Paul's boyfriend is bringing her home for the holidays to meet his family - his mother (Alexis Fawx) and sister (Jillian Janson), as well as his new stepdad (Charles Dera) and stepbrother (Tyler Nixon). It doesn't take long for Lena to discover that things are not what they seem, and that this seemingly idyllic suburban household is actually a yuletide bordello of filthy perversion. Enjoy Christmas as you've never experienced it before, Brazzers style!."::Official Site
